work.title: Chat Web Application
work.description: Built a dynamic chat platform leveraging Node.js, PeerJS, and Socket.IO, enabling real-time communication and seamless peer-to-peer connections for users.

work.title: Beauty Product Website
work.description: Crafted a stunning beauty product website design, integrating eye-catching visuals and intuitive navigation to showcase our diverse range of skincare and cosmetics.

work.title: Shopping Website
work.description: Developed a robust shopping website using Java, coupled with a powerful database backend. Seamlessly integrated features for browsing, purchasing, and managing products, offering users a smooth and secure shopping experience. Leveraged Java's versatility and database management capabilities to ensure scalability and reliability.

work.title: Tic Tac Toe
work.description: Implemented a classic game of Tic Tac Toe in Java, featuring a 3x3 grid where two players take turns placing their marks ('X' or 'O') utilizing a console-based interface

work.title: Digix Website UI UX
work.description: Designed the Digix web interface with a focus on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) principles, ensuring a seamless and intuitive platform for users. Incorporated modern design elements and interactive features to enhance engagement and navigation.

work.title: Edgy Magazine
work.description: Developed a visually captivating magazine website utilizing Shopify's versatile platform, seamlessly blending engaging content with effortless shopping capabilities. Our design focuses on user engagement and intuitive navigation, ensuring a seamless transition between browsing articles and exploring products. With a keen eye for aesthetics and functionality, our website offers a holistic online experience that captivates and converts visitors.
